title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

The Legislature has determined that vehicles using
alternative fuel sources, such as propane, compressed natural gas, liquid
petroleum gas, etc., constitute a danger to firefighters if said vehicles catch
on fire. A reflective placard will warn firefighters of the danger so that they
may react properly. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
70.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
